amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act, may be used to terminate the furnishing of services to veterans by the Department of Veterans Affairs medical facility located in St. Albans Queens, New York.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to terminate the furnishing of services to veterans by the Department of Veterans Affairs medical facility located in St. Albans, Queens, New York.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meeks (NY) amendment Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Meeks (NY).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meeks (NY) amendment Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
